Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name Dhelm-Indicators
Description Dhelm is a set of java-based open source libraries which can be used to develop software to perform technical analysis in stock market. The dhelm-indicator package includes APIs to calculate few common indicators. APIs for following indicators have been packaged into the v 1.0.0- 1. Simple Moving Average(SMA). 2. Exponential Moving Average(EMA). 3. Moving Average Convergence Divergence(MACD). 4. On Balance Volume(OBV). 5. Parabolic Stop and Reverse(PSAR). 6. Relative Strength Index(RSI).
Homepage https://dhelm.kncsolutions.in
